document_title: Left testicular pain: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_name: dau-tinh-hoan-ben-trai.json_3_How dangerous is left testicle pain?
subsection_content:
The danger of left testicular pain depends on each cause, specifically as follows: (3)
Not serious: Signs of pain and mild swelling appear after performing an action and are completely not accompanied by any other symptoms. Or mild but dull pain throughout the day, increasing when walking and doing heavy work and decreasing when lying down is common in varicocele disease.; Moderate severity: Testicular pain accompanied by a burning sensation when urinating may be a sign of a urinary tract infection or sexually transmitted disease.; Very serious: Symptoms of severe, sudden pain in the left testicle require immediate treatment.
subsection_title: dau tinh hoan ben trai.json. How dangerous is left testicle pain?
